title: MMI earns FDA clearance for robotic soft tissue dissection tools
description:
MMI’s dissection instruments are some of the smallest fully wristed robotic instruments designed for dissection in open microsurgery.

The post MMI earns FDA clearance for robotic soft tissue dissection tools appeared first on The Robot Report.
